title: The Kissing Room
description: Merle tells us her tale of love, longing, and desperation. As she struggles with the guilt over her husband's suicide, Merle's gut wrenching quest for redemption takes her on a downward spiral into a hell of her own making. Will she find hope in a mysterious stranger, or will she die, entangled in a sadistic relationship with her husband's best friend. --Violence and Strong Language-- Available in Paperback and Hardcover
author: Cheryl Anne Gardner
